document.full_text: memphis area residents were warned on saturday that the mississippi river was gradually starting to "wrap its arms" around the city and rise to record levels as flooding moves south.
document.title: river flooding begins to "wrap arms" around memphis
lines_and_colors: memphis area residents were warned on saturday that the mississippi river was gradually starting to "wrap its arms" around the city and rise to record levels as flooding moves south.
